text: "Fanfare" is a Japanese song by South Korean girl group Twice. The song and music video were released by Warner Music Japan on June 18, 2020. == Background and release == On May 4, 2020, Twice announced via a social media video that their new Japanese song titled "Fanfare" would be released on July 8, 2020 after their Korean EP More & More on June 1 of that year. ==Track listing== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |+Chart performance for "Fanfare" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2020) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- ! scope="row"| Japan (Japan Hot 100) | 1 |- ! scope="row"| Japan Combined Weekly Singles (Oricon) | 1 |} ==Certifications== ==References== ==External links== Category:2020 singles Category:2020 songs Category:Japanese-language songs Category:Twice (group) songs Category:Song articles with missing songwriters
title: Fanfare (song)
